productname: vCloud Director provider for CloudForms Installation Guide
subtitle: vCloud Director provider for CloudForms Installation Guide

abstract.para: This documentation includes the installation steps for VMware vCloudDirector provider into Red Hat CloudForms.
The functionality covered by CloudForms plug-in for vCloudDirector provider is described in Relese Notes.
